General.Name: One World Pharma Inc
General.Description: One World Products, Inc. intends to produce raw cannabis and hemp plant ingredients for medical and industrial uses. It focuses on cultivating, processing, and supplying of crude cannabis oil. One World Products, Inc. was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Las Vegas, Nevada.
General.Address: 3471 West Oquendo Road, Las Vegas, NV, United States, 89118
